data.question: What is the empirical formula of NU-200?
data.answer: C34 H30 B2 Cu2 Fe N6 O14

data.question: What are the crystal system and space group of NU-200?
What is the temperature at which the single-crystal XRD data of NU-200 was collected?
What are the unit cell dimensions of NU-200?
What is the volume and Z value of NU-200's unit cell?
How was the permanent porosity of NU-200 evaluated?
data.answer: By N2 adsorption measurements at 77 K

data.question: What was the method used to calculate the framework atom partial charges in NU-200?
data.answer: PACMOF (Partial Atomic Charges in Metal-Organic Frameworks) software

data.question: What is the estimated static binding energy of Xe at nearly zero coverage for NU-200?
True or False: The IAST selectivity for a 20:80 Xe/Kr binary gas mixture in NU-200 decreases with increasing pressure.
What is the role of cyclohexyl groups in NU-200 according to the computational simulations?
data.answer: The cyclohexyl groups provide multiple binding sites to firmly trap Xe, demonstrating a unique pore confinement effect.

data.question: True or False: NU-200 exhibits high uptake of SO2, especially at low-pressure regions, placing it among the best-performing materials for SO2 capture.
What is the calculated IAST selectivity of NU-200 for a binary SO2/CO2 mixture (v/v = 10/90) at 1 bar and 298 K?
True or False: The binding sites of Kr in NU-200 are very similar to those of Xe but with lower binding affinity.
What is the main conclusion regarding the adsorption mechanism of Xe and Kr in NU-200 based on experimental and computational results?
data.answer: The ultramicroporous hydrophobic pockets provide sufficient confinement effects for the enhancement of Xe capture and Xe/Kr separation.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of NU-200 involves heating a mixture of H4L and Cu(NO3)2·3H2O in DMF and ethanol at 80 °C for 2 days.
What is the role of HBF4 in the synthesis of NU-200?
data.answer: HBF4 acts as the modulator in the synthesis process.

data.question: True or False: The crystallographic data of NU-200 was refined by full-matrix least squares refinement on F2 using the SHELXL-2014/7 software.
What is the significance of the cyclohexane-functionalized iron(II) clathrochelate-based meta-benzenedicarboxylate linker in the structure of NU-200?
data.answer: The linker contributes to the formation of hierarchical ultramicroporous pocket-like cavities in NU-200, optimal for Xe accommodation and leading to high Xe uptake capacity and Xe/Kr separation selectivity.

data.question: True or False: The water stability study of NU-200 indicated that it can resist water vapor for at least 24 hours without compromising its crystallinity and porosity.
What experimental technique was used to confirm the phase purity of NU-200?
data.answer: The phase purity of NU-200 was confirmed by the good agreement of the simulated and as-synthesized powder X-ray diffraction (PXRD) patterns.
